LanguageData.OE_BattlecraftRush.label: battlecraft rush
LanguageData.OE_BattlecraftRush.description: Combat stats is enhanced because this person used a battlecraft pump while deathresting. This effect lasts until the next deathrest.
LanguageData.OE_PerfectioningRush.label: perfectioning rush
LanguageData.OE_PerfectioningRush.description: Working stats is enhanced because this person used a perfectioning pump while deathresting. This effect lasts until the next deathrest.
